data.title: Meet Abigail Spencer Boyfriend Oscar Valls: New Affair In Town
data.meta_description: Actress Abigail Spencer is best known for portraying Rebecca Tyree on the ABC daytime television soap opera All My Children. The actress is in the limelight regarding her affair. Meet Abigail Spencer…
data.text:
Actress Abigail Spencer is best known for portraying Rebecca Tyree on the ABC daytime television soap opera All My Children.

The actress is in the limelight regarding her affair. Meet Abigail Spencer boyfriend Oscar Valls, and find out more about their relationship.

Without further ado, let’s dig right into the 2000 Soap Opera Digest Awards winner actress.

Early Life Of Abigail Spencer

The American actress was born on August 4, 1981, in Gulf Breeze, Florida, U.S., to parents Yancy Spencer III and Lydia Ann Brown.

Yancy was a surfer from Pensacola, Florida, who left this world behind on February 14, 2011. The actress also has two siblings, Yancy Spencer IV and Sterling Spencer.

The actress started her journey in acting career in 1997 and is still present in the industry.

Spencer married Andrew Pruett in 2004, and they welcomed their son, Roman Pruett, in 2008. Their relationship did not work so well, so they initiated a divorce in February 2012 and got divorced in 2013.
